item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Sunday Brunch on December 7th will be at 12:30pm at:

Blu Restaurant (Best of Boston 2008).
4 Avery St., 4th Floor (Sports Club LA Entrance)
Boston, MA
(617) 375-8550
www.blurestaurant.com
Price: Reasonable

Blu started out as a private cafe and restaurant for members of the Ritz Carlton and The Sports Club. This is why it's prices are so reasonable. Further, since I'm a member at The Sports Club, we'll get a discount. Blue is in the same building as the AMC movie theatre off of Boston Common and the Sports Club LA. Enter via the Sports Club Entrance on 4 Avery St. and take the elevator to the 4th Floor. Then turn left.

Blu sits in a fantastic location, just between the Boston Common and Washington St. So it has a cool view overlooking the Paramount Theatre, which I believe is the oldest in the nation. After brunch you can go for a walk in the Common, shop along Washington St/Downtown Crossing, or catch a matinee movie or play. This would make for a perfect Sunday! If all goes well, I could be up for a walk or for seeing a movie Also, there is this awesome old hat shop just around the corner on Tremont. Very cool.

Anyway, hope to see you all at Blu this week. If not, whatever you're up to, I hope you are doing well and taking care.

Cheers,
Michael
